sentence: Since endorsing Harriet Hageman, an attorney and former Trump critic, to take on Cheney, Trump has been engrossed with even minor developments in the campaign.
author: David Catanese
title: Trump Is Making the Midterms a Referendum on Himself

sentence: And in Wyoming, GOP Rep. Liz Cheney raised $2 million in the last quarter, compared to Trump back challengers Harriet Hageman's $443,000.
author: John Wright
title: MAGA candidates getting trounced in fundraising -- and showing limits of Trump's power: report

sentence: Polling suggests Trump-endorsed Republican Harriet Hageman leads Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Trump Rescinds Support For BrooksLatest Mishap In His Bid To Control Midterms
